response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds significant value for us at $1,200,000, but considering its importance to you, we believe it's time to bridge the gap between our expectations and yours. We are offering this masterpiece to you for $950,000. This price reflects not only the intrinsic worth of the product but also acknowledges its immense value to you. We trust that this offer will allow us to share this remarkable item with you while ensuring its acquisition aligns with both our financial goals and your aspirations. Please let us know if you would like to proceed with this proposal.", "product_price": 950000}
